title: Simulation-Based Quality Engineering Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistical concepts and fundamental principles of quality management
context.additional_context: Collaborative project environment utilizing smartphone-based simulation tools

learning_goals: Learners can identify core experimental parameters with 80% accuracy in a simulation environment that mimics real-world industrial problems.
Learners can complete a quality optimization project using a smartphone-based design tool (DOE simulation app).
Through team-based formative assessments, learners can present product/process improvement proposals in a statistically verifiable manner.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
